articles.description: Listen to 5 Live radio commentary and follow live text updates from the opening day of The Masters from Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia, USA.
articles.title: Masters 2024 LIVE: Round one leaderboard, scores, commentary and updates from Augusta

articles.description: Liverpool's 3-0 home defeat to Atalanta in the Europa League was their worst performance under Jurgen Klopp, says former Reds defender Stephen Warnock.
articles.title: 'Worst Liverpool performance under Klopp'

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen score twice in the last 10 minutes to break West Ham's resistance and take the advantage after the first leg of their Europa League quarter-final.
articles.title: Leverkusen strike late to beat stubborn West Ham

articles.description: Ninety-seven Liverpool fans died as a result of April 1989's Hillsborough disaster. Nottingham Forest fans have been the silent witnesses of the horror that day.
articles.title: Facing disaster - the Forest fans at Hillsborough

articles.description: Goals from Ollie Watkins and John McGinn give Aston Villa a narrow first-leg lead over Lille in their Europa Conference League quarter-final as Unai Emery marked his 1,000th game as a manager.
articles.title: Villa narrowly beat Lille in quarter-final first leg

articles.description: Fernando Alonso's passion for Formula 1 shines like a blinding light as 42-year-old announces his decision to race on with Aston Martin, writes Andrew Benson.
articles.title: Fernando Alonso: Aston Martin driver says he 'lives and breathes' Formula 1

articles.description: The ex-American football star was controversially acquitted of double murder of wife and friend in 1995.
articles.title: OJ Simpson, NFL star cleared in ‘trial of the century’, dies aged 76

articles.description: As Jurgen Klopp nears the end of his tenure at Liverpool, BBC Sport visits Anfield to analyse the impact of the German on the club, the city, and discuss how the Reds will handle his impeding departure.
articles.title: 'Things will never be the same again' - Can Liverpool thrive after Klopp?

articles.description: A spokesperson for the Bayern Munich star says his three eldest children are fine after the collision.
articles.title: Harry Kane says children 'fine' after car crash in Germany

articles.description: Liverpool face a huge battle to stay in the Europa League after a shock home defeat to Atalanta in the quarter-final first leg at Anfield.
articles.title: Liverpool suffer shock home defeat to Atalanta
